Summary: TWO STAR LIKE SPHERES ACROSS THE SKY THEN STOPPED ON A DIME THEN BACK ACROSS THE SKY AND WENT OUT OF SIGHT.
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There was one other sighting in Grand Rapids on or around April 28th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsON THE DECK LETTING MY DOG INSIDE, I FIRST NOTICED AN OBJECT INCREDIBLY HIGH UP IN THE SKY MOVING VERY FAST-TO HIGH FOR A NORMAL JET OR AIRCRAFT-IT STOPPED, THEN FLASHED AS BRIGHT AS STAR-THE LIGHT DIMMED AND IT CONTINUED ACROSS THE SKY FURTHER UP UNTIL IT DISAPPEARED-ANOTHER OBJECT APPEARED FROM THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION-STOPPED-FLASHED BRILLIANTLY THEN SHOT OFF FURTHER UP INTO THE SKY UNTIL IT DISAPPEARED. ON A SIDE NOT MY SON HAD COME DOWNSTAIRS STATING THAT HE SAW A "ROCKET" OR SOMETHING OUT OF HIS BEDROOM WINDOW EARLIER, BEING THE PARENT I TOLD HIM HE JUST SAW A STAR AND THAT NO ROCKETS ARE IN THE SKY TONIGHT-HE IS NINE. ITS TIMES LIKE THIS I WISH I HAD A VIDEO CAMERA WITH A VERY LARGE ZOOM.
